spell_tooltip.description: Rampage, Onslaught, and Odyn's Fury damage reduce healing the target receives by 3% for 12 sec, stacking up to 12 times.

Your Shout abilities have additional effects.
 Battle Shout:
Increases Stamina by 3%.
 Piercing Howl:
Radius increased by 50%
 Berserker Shout:
Range increased by 8 yds.
 Intimidating Shout:
Cooldown reduced by 15 sec.
 Rallying Cry:
Removes movement impairing effects and grants 30% movement speed to allies.
 Thunderous Roar:
Targets receive 5% more damage from all sources while bleeding.

You have a chance to become Enraged while you are suffering movement impairing effects.

Suffering loss of control effects have a chance to grant you Recklessness for 5 sec.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 10% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 74,616 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 30,400 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 36,375 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.
Mortal Strike and Cleave have a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 87,511 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 25,321 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Mortal Strike deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Restores 20% health instantly and removes all diseases, poisons, and curses affecting you.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Slam, Cleave, and Whirlwind deal 10% more damage and 10% increased critical strike damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Cleave hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 6% and movement speed is increased by 4%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 313,413 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 892,728 physical damage over 16 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Activating Avatar or Recklessness grants 8 sec of the other.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 408,731 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 8 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 375,766 Physical damage.

Generates 12 Rage.
Enrage increases the damage your abilities deal by an additional 15% and Enrage's duration is increased by 1 sec.
Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 581,795 Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 337,875 health over 12 sec.
Bloodthirst deals 50% increased damage to enemies who are below 35% health.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Each Rampage strike has a 25% chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.

Whirlwind causes your next 2 single-target attacks to strike up to 4 additional targets for 55% damage.

Whirlwind generates 3 Rage, plus an additional 1 per target hit. Maximum 8 Rage.
Raging Blow increases the critical strike chance of your next Bloodthirst by 15% until it critically strikes, stacking up to 5 times.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 12 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Whirlwind deals 25% more damage and affects your next 4 single-target attacks.
Mastery increased by 1% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 0.5 sec.
Haste increased by 2% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 2 Rage.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 902,433 Physical damage to all enemies over 9.4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Every 20 Rage you spend on attacks reduces the remaining cooldown on Warbreaker, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Mortal Strike at your target or random nearby enemy.
Rampage has a 6% chance to grant Recklessness for 4 sec.
Recklessness lasts 4.0 sec longer.

Damaging enemies with Thunder Clap, Raging Blow, or Execute has a 25% chance to also strike one with a lightning bolt, dealing 128,165 Nature damage.

Lightning Strikes occur 30% more often during Avatar.

Stormstrike or Nature damage your abilities deal is increased by 5%. Stormstrike damage ignores Armor.

Thunder Clap damage increased by 40%. 

Seismic Reverberations, Improved Whirlwind, Meat Cleaver, and Barbaric Training now affect Thunder Clap in addition to Whirlwind.
Lightning Strikes also deal 37,541 to enemies near their target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Shield Slam damage increased by 15%.

Bloodthirst and Rampage damage increased by 25%.

Shield Slam and Bloodthirst have a 35% chance to grant you Thunder Blast, stacking up to 2 charges.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage and generates 2 Rage.
Storm Bolt also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning them for 2 sec, but its cooldown is increased by 10 sec.

Stamina increased by 5%.

Impending Victory increases your maximum health by 10% for 5 sec. When this health increase expires, you heal for any amount of the original Impending Victory that healed you in excess of your full health.
Thunder Blast calls down a Lightning Strike on an enemy it hits.

Lightning Strikes generate 3 Rage.

Raging Blow and Execute damage increased by 25%.
Lightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Bloodthirsts have no cooldown.

Casting Avatar grants you 2 charges of Thunder Blast and resets the cooldown of Thunder Clap.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a 10% chance to grant you Avatar for 4 secs.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 1.5 million Physical damage over 4.7 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.

Activating Recklessness generates 50 Rage and while Recklessness is active, Raging Blow and Bloodthirst are replaced by Crushing Blow and Bloodbath.

 Crushing Blow
Strike a mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 450,272 Physical damage. 

Crushing Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown and its critical strikes deal 20% additional damage.

Generates 12 Rage.

 Bloodbath
Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 488,771 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Bloodbath causes the target to bleed for 166,852 damage over 12 sec. Using Bloodbath on a target that is affected by Bloodbath extends the bleed by 12 sec.

Generates 8 Rage.

Unleashes your power, dealing 639,944 Physical damage and an additional 741,168 Physical damage over 10 sec to all enemies within 12 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 15 Rage.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Mortal Strike at your target or random nearby enemy.
Odyn's Fury's Enrages you, deals 10% increased damage and grants you 2 stacks of Whirlwind.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Each strike of Bladestorm deals an additional 10% damage evenly split across all targets.
When Overpower has its cooldown reset by Tactician, your next Overpower deals 25% additional damage and 25% additional critical damage.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.

Mortal Strike and Cleave when it hits 3 or more targets have a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 469,510 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Overpower damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.

Your auto-attacks generate 10% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 75,997 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 29,568 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 35,704 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Mortal Strike and Cleave have a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 25,256 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Mortal Strike deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Your auto-attacks have a 20% chance to hurl weapons at your target and 3 other enemies in front of you, dealing an additional 31,239 Physical damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 6% and movement speed is increased by 4%.
Critical strike chance increased by 2% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by 10%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 314,448 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 892,728 physical damage over 16 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Activating Avatar or Recklessness grants 8 sec of the other.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 410,644 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 8 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 373,262 Physical damage.

Generates 12 Rage.
Enrage increases your Haste by 15% and increases your movement speed by 10%.
Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
Your attacks have a chance to reset the cooldown of Execute and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 576,275 Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 337,875 health over 12 sec.
Bloodthirst deals 50% increased damage to enemies who are below 35% health.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Each Rampage strike has a 25% chance to refund a charge of Raging Blow.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Execute increases the critical strike chance of Execute by 10% for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Raging Blow increases the critical strike chance of your next Bloodthirst by 15% until it critically strikes, stacking up to 5 times.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 12 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Mastery increased by 2% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 1.0 sec.
Haste increased by 2% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 2 Rage.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 1.6 million Physical damage over 4.7 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.
Every 20 Rage you spend on attacks reduces the remaining cooldown on Warbreaker, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Mortal Strike at your target or random nearby enemy.
Recklessness lasts 4.0 sec longer.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.

When Overpower has its cooldown reset by Tactician, your next Overpower deals 25% additional damage and 25% additional critical damage.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.

Mortal Strike and Cleave when it hits 3 or more targets have a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 459,696 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Overpower damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.
